title: No Call Window within a Group Chat
body:
**Describe the bug**
If i join a call within a group chat, no call windows appears, but I can hear the others and the others hear me.

**To Reproduce**
Steps to reproduce the behavior:
1. Go to 'a Group Chat'
2. Click on 'join or Start Call'

4. No call windows appears

**Expected behavior**
a call windows shoud appear where i can see the other members of the call and the buttons end call, mute, cam off/on and cast display

**Desktop (please complete the following information):**
 - Linux Mint Cinnamon
 - Version 6.2.9
